channel.title: John Paul on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in John Paul on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Dates-n-Mates nightclub for people with learning disabilities
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan JP - John Paul MM We are at the Arches in Glasgow for the ‘Late’ event, it’s Scotland’s first fully inclusive club night for people with learning disabilities and one of the Directors is here from Dates-n-Mates, John Paul. Now, John Paul, before you tell us a bit about the campaign, can you first of all tell us a bit about what is Dates-n-Mates? JP Yes, no bother, Michael.
